message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you significant benefits. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to feel like I'm getting a good deal.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $10500. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the product's value to you. I'm open to further negotiations, but I need to feel like I'm getting a decent return on my investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500, and I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement on this price.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm still not comfortable selling the product at $9500. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $10000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to accept.
